titleStmt.title: SII 7.772: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 772. (A.R. No. 148 of 1902). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE VAMANAPURISVARA SHRINE AT TIRUMANIKULI, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmātu puṇarap puvimātu vaḷaran nāmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpat tan tiruppatumalaraṭi manṉavar cūṭa maṉṉiya Urimaiyāl maṇimuṭi cūṭic ceṅkol ceṉṟu ticaitoṟum vaḷaṟppa meyyaṟa n=taḻaippak kaliṅka miriyak kaṭamalai nāṭātti valaṅko ḷāḻi varaiyūḻi naṭātti Irucuṭaraḷavu morukuṭai niḻaṟṟi cempe
cempoṉ virasiṁhāsana ttu tiripuvanamuḻutumuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakecaripaṉmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvikkiramacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu patiṉoṉṟāvatu yaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu Ekādaśiyum putaṉkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa vicākattu nāḷ rājarājavaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu vāṉavaṉmātevipurattu nakarat
taveḷāṉum veḷiyūruṭaiyān veḷān e ṟāṉa muṭikoṇṭacoḻa muventaveḷāṉum Ikkuṭi Āriyaporocaṉ kayiṟūrveḷāṉāṉa tillaiṉāyaka muventaveḷāṉum m Iṉṉāṭ ṭutavittirumāṇikuḻiyāḷuṭaiyar mulapiruttiyarāṉa Āticaṇṭecurartevaṟku nāṅkaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevarkku yāṇṭu nā
vaṭakkaṭainta Āṟumāvil kiḻakkaṭaiya nilam Orumāvum Iraṇṭāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu nālāñ catirattut teṟkaṭainta nilam Āṟumāvil māṉakāntaṉukkuk kiḻakku nilam Oru nta Āṟumāvil māṉakāntaṉukkuk kiḻakku nilam Orumāvum muṉṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu nālāñ catirattut teṟkaṭainta nilam Āṟu māvil māṉakā
ṇāṟṟu mutaṟ catirattut tuṇṭattum Āka Uṭpaṭa nirnilattukkum Ivvāṇṭumutal Innilattukku nāṅkaḷ Iṟuppa niccayittuk kuṭuttaparicāvatu Innilattu kkaṭaṉ Ūrkkālāl Iruṉūṟṟukkala nelle cantirātittavaṟ Iṟukkakkaṭavatākavum Innilattukku Iṟaikāvalāka Inta Āti
peṟavaittu Innellu Iruṉūṟṟuk kalamum Iṟukkakkaṭavatāka niccayittuk kuṭuttom Ivvaṉaivom Innilattil Ellāp payirkaḷ ceytukoṇṭum Āṭṭaikkaṭaṉ Ūrkkālāl Iṉnellu Irunūṟṟuk kalamumme koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum Inṉilattukku Ituvalla
ṭavatallātākavum Innilattukku nilam yāl vanta kaṭavatākavum Ituvallatu tatākavum Innilattukkup paṇṭāṭu paḻanaṭai yāya maṭaiyavum vāravum peṟuvatākavum Ippaṭi sam
The inscription seems to be built in at the right end.
Digital edition of SII 7.772 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
